SA14knavslou:3: sarvā pāramitās tatra tādātmyena vyavasthitāḥ // Nś_1 //
SA14knavslou:11: punarbhavam iti khyātaṃ pratibhāsopamaṃ hi tat // Nś_5_[1] //
SA14knavslou:13: tadvat paśyati rūpāṇi karmabhir nirmitaṃ jagat // Nś_6_[2] //
SA14knavslou:14: dharmaṃ deśayataḥ śabdā ye kecit śrutigocarāḥ /
SA14knavslou:17: svapnatulyam idaṃ sarvam upalabdhaṃ na vidyate // Nś_8_[4] //
SA14knavslou:18: māyāyantro naro yadvad bhinnāṃ ceṣṭāṃ karoti vai /
SA14knavslou:19: tadvad ceṣṭāṃ karoty eva dehayantro nirātmakaḥ // Nś_9_[5] //
SA14knavslou:25: udakacandropamaṃ tad dhi pratyakṣaṃ na vidyate // Nś_12_[8] //
SA14knavslou:26: yoginām api yaj jñānaṃ tad apy ākāśalakṣaṇam /
SA14knavslou:27: tasmāj jñānaṃ ca jñeyaṃ ca sarvam ākāśalakṣaṇam // Nś_13_[9] //
